description.en: Sanctuary is a political thriller and crime story that featured two childhood friends, Akira Hojo and Chiaki Asami, who are ruthlessly struggling to set a new paradigm of living in Japan. However, the two friends took radically different paths (playing Rock Paper Scissors to decide who does what): Akira chose the dark path and joined a Yakuza gang, while Chiaki strived to become the youngest member of the Japanese Diet. Being survivors of the Cambodian killing fields, the two characters developed an unmatched aggression and survival instincts, helping them to achieve their common ultimate goal: making Japan their own sanctuary.
description.ja: 北条彰は六本木周辺を縄張りとする暴力団・北彰会の総長。ある日、北条は組員の田代を伴い、佐倉代議士のスキャンダラスな写真をネタに強請（ゆすり）を計画。その事務所を訪れるが、そこで政治家秘書には珍しい強面（こわもて）の男に追い返されてしまう。田代が事務所に帰った頃、北条は驚いたことにその秘書・浅見千秋と会っていた。そして、北条は浅見と共に国会議事堂を見ながらつぶやく。「オレは、必ずおまえをあの赤絨毯の上に立たせてみせる！」と………

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

A food-loving tattooist, YooJung. After losing consciousness due to a sudden accident she opens her eyes to find herself possessing ‘Sylvia’, a character from the novel she read. In addition, she happens to meet ‘Felix’, the hero of the novel, who, due to the abuse of his stepmother, suffers from anorexia and will soon turn the continent into blood. In order to eat more delicious food, to cook more easily, Sylvia inscribes magic circles on to her body. The new magic circles that are born through her fingertips bring a new breeze to the continent where magic-beasts are rampant.

The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

altTitles.ja: イノサン Rouge ルージュ

description.en:
The eve of the French revolution, 1772:  
The eldest brother of the Sanson family, Charles-Henri, has grown as an executioner, while his sister Marie-Joseph has been living freely in Versailles. But then Marie-Joseph's first love, a man named Alain, is killed by aristocrats. The histories of innocents plunges into the arc of the crimson revolution, Rouge.

---
* **Won the 24th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2021**

altTitles.ja: 攻撃力ゼロから始める剣聖譚

altTitles.en: The Master Swordman's Story Starts with the Zero Ability to Attack

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện của Kiếm sĩ vô năng trên con đường trở thành Thánh Kiếm

altTitles.en: Tale of the Sword Saint Beginning with Zero Attack Power

description.en: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
description.es-la: Eugene procede de una familia de famosos espadachines, pero es tachado de "espadachín defectuoso" Que a pesar de poseer extraordinarias habilidades defensivas su poder ofensivo es basura. Abandona su país y se matricula en la principal escuela del continente, la Academia de Magia. En la academia, le piden a Eugene que vaya a lo más profundo de la prisión sellada, donde se se encuentran criaturas míticas y él es el único al que no afecta el miasma que estas desprenden. Sellado en las profundidades más oscuras de la prisión, donde incluso los más grandes magos de todos los tiempos caen de rodillas en el camino, se encuentra a la legendaria Rey Demonio Erinyes, que una vez gobernó el continente. Eugene llega fácilmente hasta ella, y ¿Parece que es el único que puede hacer un contrato con la Rey Demonio...? Una historia fantástica de otro mundo en la que un espadachín caído que se ha hecho con el poder del Rey Demonio ¡se convierte en el santo de la espada más fuerte! ¡Una historia que transcurre en el mismo universo de Shinja Zero Megami!

title.en: Hakoiri Ojou-sama to Shoumin na Ore no Yaritai 100 no Koto

altTitles.ja: 箱入りお嬢様と庶民な俺のやりたい100のこと

altTitles.en: 100 Things a Sheltered Young Lady Wants to Do With Me, a Commoner

description.en:
Sanada Yuki, meets Tenkoin Junna, a young lady who ran away from home because she hates her life without freedom. He gives her a notebook and advises her to write down what she wants to do and together they will make it happen, but then she gets picked up by the police. Yuki wants to be by Junna's side even if they live in different worlds!

*"I want a friend" 
"I want to hold your hand" 
"I want to be your lover."*

A love comedy between a commoner and a young lady who make their wishes come true is about to begin!

After humanity's successful conquest of the Gate, peace has returned once again. However, the powerful psychic abilities of the Espers have become a double-edged sword for humanity, causing them great distress.

A new opportunity arises for Esper "NO.00 Michael," who is facing imminent death.

Adam, a retired soldier who has always struggled with the relationship between Guides and Espers, decides to give Michael, the cause of his leg injury, a second chance.

Adam gives Michael a new name, "Eve," in the hope that he can live a normal life, blending in with humanity.

The two, who have always fought on the front lines, risking their lives, embark on a journey to live a peaceful life in the embrace of humanity, dreaming of an ordinary existence.

altTitles.th: ซิก้า วูลฟ์

description.en: On a mission to find the two most important people in her life, Sica steps foot outside the Magician's Tower for the first time ever! She soon meets Karsus, a mercenary swordsman who looks like her first love. Despite being confused for someone else, Karsus offers to help find the people Sica's looking for if she helps him with his work. Thus the two begin their adventure ― one that will change not only the fate of the Empire but also their hearts! First love or Karsus... who will Sica choose?

altTitles.ja: ボクを知りたすぎる清水さん

altTitles.en: Shimizu-san who wants to know me too much

altTitles.id: Shimizu-san yang sangat ingin mengenal aku

description.en:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
description.es: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!
description.id:
Atago Gato adalah anak SMA yang pemalu dan tertutup. Suatu hari, saat mempersiapkan festival sekolah, teman sekelasnya yang lucu dan ceria bernama Shimizu Roman mengetahui bahwa dia bercita-cita menjadi seorang seniman manga. Bukankah itu luar biasa? Gadis populer, yang sepertinya hidup di dunia yang berbeda darinya, menaruh minat padanya dan menanyakan banyak pertanyaan yang tidak pernah dia duga! Saat dia mengakui pengalaman traumatis setelah dikritik di SNS... Shimizu-san mencoba membantunya mengatasinya dengan cara yang sedikit aneh...?
Sebuah komedi romantis masa muda di mana seorang gadis ceria dan seorang anak laki-laki muram berjuang untuk membuat manga!
description.ja: 陰キャで引っ込み思案の高校生・愛宕画人（あたごがくと）。ある日、文化祭の準備中に陽キャで可愛すぎる女子高生・清水ろまんに『マンガ家を目指している』ことがバレてしまう。「めっちゃスゴくない！？」住む世界が違うカノジョから興味を持たれて、まさかの質問攻め！？ SNSで批判されたトラウマを告白すると…清水さんは、ちょっぴりカゲキな方法で克服させようとしてきて――？　陽キャな女子と陰キャな男子がマンガ作りに奮闘する青春ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!

title.en: Ten no Ryuu Chi no Sakura

altTitles.en: Dragon in the Sky*Cherry on the Ground
Ten no Ryuu * Chi no Sakura

description.en:
Sakura Karukaya liked her life: she was just a high schooler who loved rhythmic gymnastics, being raised by her older brother and sister. However, both of her siblings were hiding secrets about themselves and Sakura that would make her realize that the world around them was not what it seemed. Now, with the help of a mysterious dragon named Yoiyami, Sakura will have to confront these forces and the power within her if she wants to rescue her beloved brother and sister.  
  
[PL] Sakura lubiła swoje dotychczasowe życie. Była smukłą i wysoką dziewczyną ze zdolnościami do gimnastyki artystycznej. Jednak jej życie zmieniło się, kiedy dowiedziała się, że jej świat został zbudowany z iluzji…

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Dantoudai no Hanayome - Sekai wo Horobosu Futsutsuka na Tatsuki desu ga.

altTitles.ja: 断頭台の花嫁 世界を滅ぼすふつつかな竜姫ですが。

altTitles.en: Bride on the Guillotine: The Dragon Princess Who Destroys the World

altTitles.es-la: La profecía de la princesa de la destrucción

description.en:
A "dragon" appears from a container that fell in front of Dazai Ryunosuke's eyes.

The disastrously beautiful "dragon", Rinne Irako, had been condemned to death as a world-destroying calamity, and was being transported to a place of refuge.

Rinne Irako was sentenced to death and transported. But as fate would have it, the "dragon" girl had a miraculous encounter with a boy, and her destiny was about to change drastically.
description.es-la: En un mundo al borde de la catástrofe, Ryuunosuke Dazai se convierte en el protagonista de una historia intrigante. Su encuentro con Rinne Irako, una figura deslumbrante y peligrosa, desencadena un giro de los acontecimientos. Rinne, condenada a muerte por su naturaleza caótica destinada a destruir el mundo, es trasladada bajo estricta seguridad. Sin embargo, un encuentro fortuito con Dazai despierta una chispa de esperanza en ambos. Juntos, se embarcan en una trascendental travesía para detener el cataclismo inminente y salvar la existencia. Enfrentando desafíos y sacrificios, descubren el poder del amor mutuo como su arma más poderosa contra la destrucción. Guiados por un propósito superior, se unen para proteger y preservar el mundo que aman, demostrando la capacidad humana de trascender la oscuridad y encontrar redención a través del amor.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

altTitles.ja: あのキャラがABJマークとコラボ!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ano Chara ga ABJ Mark to Colabo!

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Shuppankoho](https://shuppankoho.jp/damage/tokusetsu-3.html) (Click the blue button)
- Video version - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/jCYUazxydpc)
description.ja:
海賊版でマンガが危ない!

ABJマークの付いているサービスで読もう!

- ABJマークって「なんの略」?
>「Authorized Books of Japan＝公認された日本の本」、つまり「正規の出版物」という意味です。

- どうして今、ABJマークなの?
> 残念なことにネット上には、いわゆる「海賊版」（クリエイターから許諾を得ずに、勝手にアップしている違法な電子出版物）があふれています。しかも、正規のサービスと見分けがつかない海賊版サイトも出現しています。一目で正規版サービスであることがわかるマーク、それがABJマークです。電子書店をはじめとする各サービスの目につくところ、おもにトップページに掲示されています。

- ABJマークって「なに」?
> 電子書店等を利用して電子出版物を楽しんでいる読者に対し、そのサービスが、クリエイターからきちんと許諾を受けて配信している正規のサービスであることを示すマークです（でも、正規のサービス全部についているわけではありません。これから、どんどん増えていきます）。

- ABJマークは「安心のマーク」
> このマークがあるサービスで読めば、安心です。海賊版サイトと知らずにアクセスすると、ウィルスやフィッシング詐欺、強制マイニングなどの危険にさらされる可能性があります。また、正規版で読んでいただくことによって、そこからクリエイターに対価が支払われ、新しい次の作品を生み出す力になります。海賊版サイトは、クリエイターに何の利益ももたらしません。運営者が不当に儲けるだけです。

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!

altTitles.en: มิไร ลูกหนังข้ามเวลา

description.en: While on a soccer tour, Toudou Mirai is involved in a shipwreck accident. When he comes to, he finds himself in 19th Century England. With him being saved by a player of the local soccer team named "Durham", Eddie, it seems Mirai will be joining "Durham", a team with their sights set on joining the world's first ever professional league… What with slipping through time, will Mirai ever make it back to the 21st Century?! This is a science fiction soccer story bringing the true talents of playing soccer straight to you!
At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

description.en:
I’ve always had a fascination with the occult; you might even call it my specialty. I’ve been brought in as a consultant on many supernatural and strange mysteries. But nothing could have prepared me for this house. It seemed so ordinary at first, except for that one room. It had no doors, no windows, and was tucked away, leaving anyone to think it was just a wall. I knew that there was something more to it. It shouldn’t be there, it shouldn’t exist, and yet…

Just what is this house, and what dark secrets does it hold?
description.ja: オカルト専門ライターの「私」は知人から、とある家の間取り図を見せられた。そこには正体不明の「謎の空間」が存在するという。建築設計士・栗原に意見を求めると、彼はこの家のおかしなところを次々に指摘し始めた……！

title.en: Moto Isekai Tenisha datta Kachou no Ojisan, Jinsei Nidome no Isekai wo Kake Meguru

altTitles.ja: 元異世界転移者だった課長のおじさん、人生二度目の異世界を駆け廻る

altTitles.en: The Section Chief Uncle Who's a Former Transferee to Another World Goes to Another World a Second Time

altTitles.ko: 전 이세계 전이자였던 과장 아저씨, 인생 두 번째 이세계를 누빈다

description.en:
Souya, the manager of a trading company in a small city, is a 37-year-old office worker who enjoys single life.

One day, when he wakes up in a strange meadow, he sees two moons floating in the night sky and regains the memory of being transferred to another world 20 years ago.

An uncle’s adventure in a different world, wearing a business suit, with a low amount of tension, a high level of ability, and a cool but slightly pathetic personality. It’s a different world transition, but it may have an old-fashioned fantasy atmosphere.

altTitles.en: No Longer Allowed In Another World

description.en:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers–sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?

---

Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book Ningen Shikkaku (No Longer Human/Disqualified From Being Human).
description.ru: После неудачного двойного самоубийства, наш главный герой переносится в другой мир. И чтобы не случилось, он обещает, что найдёт свою любовь и в этом мире, и опять покончит с собой.
description.uk: Як і у відомій книзі Осаму Дадзая "Бракована людина" / "Крах людини", головний герой цієї історії намагається вчинити подвійне самогубство зі своєю коханою... але замість цього його збиває вантажівка і він потрапляє в інший світ. Тепер він хоче знайти свою кохану, щоб знову покінчити життя самогубством разом з нею.
description.pt-br: Em 13 de junho de 1948, o autor Osamu Dazai estava prestes a se suicidar com Shizuko Ota mas foi convocado para outro mundo. Agora ele quer encontrar a reencarnação de sua amante, para que possa cometer suicídio com ela.

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

title.en: I Am the Master in This Life

I'm the Master of This Life

altTitles.fr: La jeune fille à la pierre

altTitles.es: Soy la maestra de esta vida

altTitles.ru: В этой жизни я буду властвовать

altTitles.ja: 今度の人生は私が主人公です

altTitles.vi: Tôi sẽ làm chủ cuộc sống này!

description.ar:
ظهر لي حجر وصي الأسرة. بالنسبة لي ، الطفلة غير الشرعية وليست أختي غير الشقيقة التي هي العدو. منذ ذلك الحين ، تغيرت معاملتي. لقد شعرت حقًا أنهم جزء من عائلتهم. ومع ذلك ، عندما مات ، أدرك أن كل هذا كان وهمًا على يد خطيبته. أن كل ما فعله من أجلي كان مخططًا من قبل أختي غير الشقيقة لأخذ حجر الوصي. [ألا تريد أن تنتقم ممن خدعوك وقتلوك تمامًا؟] قررت أن أقبل العرض الحلو الشيطاني. هذه المرة ، سأحصل بالتأكيد على حجر الوصي وأصبح رب الأسرة. سأعيد لك ما عانته أو أكثر. حتى ذلك الحين ، لن يصدق أحد. لكن ... "من الآن فصاعدًا ، بغض النظر عما يحدث ، يجب ألا تتوقف وتهرب أبدًا." صورته يحاول إنقاذني ، وعيناه تجريان في اليأس ، لا يمكن محوها من ذهني. الخطيب الذي أحببته كان ينظر إلي وأنا أحتضر ، لكن لماذا تركض نحوي بتلك العيون ، التي كنت تعتقد أنها شخص أختها ... أردت أن تعرف ما هو صدقك.

---

description.en:
The guardian stone of the family appeared to me. To me, the illegitimate child, not my half-sister who is my enemy. Since then, my treatment changed. It really felt like I was part of the family. However, as I died, I realized that it was all an illusion at the hands of my fiancé. That everything he did for me was a scheme by my half-sister to take the guardian stone.

[Don't you want to take revenge on those who thoroughly deceived and killed you?]

I decided to accept the devilishly sweet offer. This time, I will definitely get the guardian stone and become the head of the household. I will give you back as much or more than what I suffered. Until then, I will believe no one. But-

“From now on, no matter what happens, you must never stop and run.”

The image of him trying to save me, his eyes running in despair, couldn't be erased from my mind. The fiancé I loved was looking at me as I died, but why were you running to me with those eyes. You, who I thought was my sister's person... I want to know where your sincerity lies.

---
Helena Croisen, bastard child of the family, thought she would finally be acknowledged when the power of the guardian stone manifested in her. Little did she know, a conspiracy was going on behind her back — one that would end with her beloved fiancé stabbing her in the heart. As Helena draws her final breath, a mysterious voice speaks to her. “Do you wish for vengeance?” Next thing she knows, she’s gone back two years in time! Will Helena be able to avoid the same tragic fate this time around?

---

description.fr:
La pierre gardienne de la famille m'est apparue. À moi, l'enfant illégitime, pas à ma demi-sœur qui est mon ennemi. Depuis, la façon dont on me traite a changé. J'avais vraiment l'impression de faire partie de la famille. Cependant, en mourant, j'ai réalisé que tout cela n'était qu'une illusion aux mains de mon fiancé. Que tout ce qu'il a fait pour moi n'était qu'un stratagème de ma demi-sœur pour prendre la pierre gardienne.

«Ne veux-tu pas prendre ta revanche sur ceux qui t'ont trompé et tué?»

J'ai décidé d'accepter l'offre diaboliquement douce. Cette fois-ci, je vais définitivement obtenir la pierre gardienne et devenir le chef de famille. Je te rendrai autant ou plus que ce que j'ai souffert. Jusque-là, je ne croira personne. Mais-

«À partir de maintenant, quoi qu'il arrive, tu ne dois jamais t'arrêter et fuir.»

L'image de lui essayant de me sauver, ses yeux remplis de désespoir, ne pouvait pas être effacée de mon esprit. Le fiancé que j'aimais me regarder alors que je suis en train de mourir, mais pourquoi tu cours vers moi avec ces yeux. Toi, qui je pensais être avec ma sœur… Je veux savoir que la vérité.

---
Herna, fille illégitime du marquis de Croizen, a grandi cachée des regards au sein du manoir familial. Mais lorsque le pouvoir de la pierre gardienne se manifeste, et qu'elle devient de facto l'héritière du domaine, les plans de la famille changent: Herna doit disparaître. Trahie par ses proches et assassinée en pleine forêt, elle se voit alors offrir un choix: mourir, ou recommencer sa vie d'héritière et se venger. Mais une question subsiste: quel sera le prix de la vengeance pour Herna?

---

description.ru:
Мне явился камень - хранитель моей семьи.

-Для меня она сводная сестра, а не незаконнорожденный ребенок!"
После этих слов отношение ко мне изменилось. 

Но я поняла, что все это иллюзия, я умерла от рук моего жениха.
Все, что он для меня сделал, было уловкой моей сводной сестры, чтобы забрать камень - хранитель.
-Разве ты не хочешь отомстить тем, кто обманул и убил тебя?"
Я решила принять сладкое предложение, от демона.
На этот раз стражем буду я. Я верну себе столько, сколько смогу.
-Что бы ни случилось с этого момента, ты никогда не должна останавливаться.”

Мой жених, которого я любила, смотрел на меня умирающими глазами.

description.tr:
Ailenin değerli taşı bana göründü. Üvey kızkardeşime değil, gayrimeşru bir çocuk olan bana. O itibaren bana olan tavırları değişti. Gerçekten onların ailesiymişim gibi hissettim. Ama bütün bunların nişanlımın ellerinde ölmekle bir illüzyon olduğunu fark ettim. Benim için yaptıkları her şey üvey kardeşimin taşımı elimden almak için kurduğu bir numaraydı.
“Seni tamamen aldatan ve öldürenlerden intikam almak istemiyor musun?”
Şeytani tatlı bir teklifi kabul etmeye karar verdim. Bu sefer, koruyucu taşı olan evin reisi olacağım. İntikamımı alana dek kimseye güvenmeyeceğim. Bana yaşattıklarınızı size fitil fitil yaşatacağım.
Ama… “Şu andan itibaren, ne olursa olsun, asla durmamalı ve kaçmamalısınız. “Beni kurtarmaya çalışması, gözleri umutsuzluk içinde akıyordu, kafamdan silemiyordum. Sevgili nişanlım ölürken bana bakıyor ama neden kız kardeşime yardım ettiğini düşündüğüm gözlerle bana öyle bakıyorsun ki… Bilmek istedim. Gerçekten samimi miydin?

I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags...

description.en: I recovered my past memories when I was hit on the head by a rock. I am Katarina Claes, the eight year old daughter of the duke. In a feverish nightmare, in which the prince’s fiancee was determined, I have realized that this is the otome game from the previous life. Also, I have turned into the villainess that interfered with the romance of the capture targets… If the heroine got a happy end, I would be exiled, while if she got a bad end, I would be killed by the capture target… I have no happy end!? Why is it only bad!? Somehow I have to avoid the destruction end, and reach old age peacefully!!

(from ebookjapan):

Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast!　The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!

Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

Cane Lele was born into the fashion industry. Her mother, Ye Fei Yi, was Taiwan's top model, and her father was also a model, until a tragic airplane crash left Lele without parents. Therefore, it is no surprise that Lele hates the industry, thinking it superficial and unnecessary.  
  
Raised by her maternal grandmother, Lele reaches seventeen before she is sucked in by her mother's sister, Ye Fei Hong, a fashion model agent (and former model), convinces the reluctant Lele to model. Lele had been adverse to the whole idea, until she sees a photo shoot of popular American model Angus Lanson, and she begins to see modeling as an art form.  
  
When Aunt Fei Hong's magazine editor invites Angus Lanson to a meeting of all the top fashion ambassadors, Lele is invited to meet him and is very curious. She does not know that Angus' twin elder brother, Eros Lanson, is secretly accompanying his brother. This obviously leads to confusion and is the start of a charming story of Lele's goals: fashion in NYC, becoming a top model, and love?

altTitles.vi: Quản Gia Nam Phụ Của Tiểu Thư Xuyên Không

altTitles.th: ภารกิจพิทักษ์พ่อบ้านสุดหล่อ

description.en: Harboring an obsession with the second male lead of the novel series *The Flower Holds a Sword*. Like always I write a commend about Lancelot and went to sleep. But something is off?! When I woke up my *favorite character* called me "milady" and brightly smiled at me! I think I won the lottery. Or I saved earth in my previous life. If you do good stuff in your past life you'll have good luck in your next life. If it's not that how could this even happen? This lottery that I won, I should use it properly. I decided I'll make my *favorite character*'s happiness my number one priority.

The first half of the book is made up by the titular story, a serial killer thriller that gets all kinds of meta and crazy as it progresses. The second half of the book consists of a short interview with Kago (and Ryuichi Kasumi, a Japanese crime fiction writer) and a number of short stories.  
  
(Source: Caterpillar)
description.es:
Shintaro Kago se adentra en el mundo del misterio en Fraction, donde además de un asesino en serie nos encontramos con el mismísimo autor como personaje de la historia.

Inquietante, terrorífico y turbador, se trata del clásico relato detectivesco que no tiene nada de clásico, en el que el autor además de poner a prueba nuestro estómago reflexiona sobre el lenguaje y la narración, haciéndonos partícipes de su particular visión del mundo. Este volumen incluye otras cuatro historietas tan repulsivas, y a la vez atrayentes, que harán las delicias de cualquier aficionado al ero-guro.

altTitles.zh-hk: 數碼寶貝03 馴獸師之王

description.en:
When three Digimon fans – Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato – suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato … seems to be somewhere in the middle.  
  
Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(The English translation is based off the script from the FoxKids version of the anime.)

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

title.en: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou sareta Senshi no Mujikaku zama~

altTitles.ja: 経験値貯蓄でのんびり傷心旅行 ～勇者と恋人に追放された戦士の無自覚ざまぁ～

altTitles.en: A Warrior Exiled by the Hero and His Lover

description.en:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Mangyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

altTitles.th: ซูบารุ เต้นสุดใจ ไกลสุดฝัน

description.en: A small five-year-old girl named Subaru no longer has time for friends and play. Why is this? Her twin brother Kazuma is dying… and gradually forgetting everything. Even Subaru. And so the girl visits him every day, talking with him and dancing for him, trying to make him remember her. And he always does by the end of the day. Encouraged by a friend to join ballet classes, the girl does so and falls in love with the dance.
description.es: Mezcla entre shojo y manga para adultos, Subaru cuenta la historia de una niña cuyo hermanito agoniza en el hospital. Para intentar distraerle de su dolor, empieza a bailar en su habitación y así descubre su pasión por el baile y que tiene aptitudes para convertirse en una bailarina prodigiosa. ¡Un paso adelante pero en versión manga!

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

description.en: An elite military unit conducts its duties alongside sabertooth tigers trained to assist their human masters. The Royal Kingdom invades the Empire in their desire for world dominion…after the disastrous opening battle of the war, the unit fights to save not only itself but their comrades from the enemy.

description.en:
Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.

---
**Links:**
- Promotional video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/FdEk9V9g424)
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

description.en:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

title.en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga

altTitles.ja: 奴隷からの期待と評価のせいで搾取できないのだが

altTitles.en: Due to Their Appreciation and Expectations, I Can't Exploit My Slaves

altTitles.es-la: No puedo aprovecharme de mis esclavas por la talentosas que son

description.en: A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, "Restoration." Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye. The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
転生した少年・アレンは女神からチート能力【再生】を授かる。
ありとあらゆるケガや病気を治療できるものの、活躍の場は限られるため、奴隷の少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策する。
だが、完治した奴隷たちのチートがダンチすぎて、農作物や居住環境は瞬く間に完熟。
活躍の場を次々に奪われる主人公・アレンは現代知識で対抗するが、それも優秀な奴隷たちが吸収し、商売で大成功。
主人公の影がどんどん薄くなっていく……！？
description.es-la:
El chico reencarnado, Allen, recibe del dios un poder trampa llamado "Regeneración". Aunque puede curar cualquier herida o enfermedad, su oportunidad de brillar es limitada. Por eso, planea regenerar a las chicas esclavas y llevar una vida tranquila con su harén. 

Sin embargo, las chicas esclavas completamente curadas son demasiado fuertes, lo que lleva a un rápido crecimiento en la producción de alimentos y las condiciones de vida. Allen intenta competir con su conocimiento moderno, pero sus talentosas esclavas lo superan y tienen un gran éxito en los negocios. 
La sombra del protagonista se va desvaneciendo cada vez más... 
¿Podrá recuperar su lugar en la historia?

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

description.en:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?

As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

title.en: My Stepsister Who is Perfect in Public, Shows Her True Colors at Home

altTitles.ja: 外面は最高なのに、家では本性むき出しの義姉

altTitles.ja-ro: Sotozura wa Saikou na no ni, Ie de wa Honsei Mukidashi no Gimai

altTitles.en: Even though the outside is the best, her sister-in-law has a bare nature at home

altTitles.es-la: Mi hermanastra que es perfecta en público, muestra su verdadera cara en casa.

description.en:
**Second English title is the one used on Amazon.** (I know it's not correct but thought I'd add it)

~ Heatmanga

altTitles.ja: 僕はお姉ちゃんのおもちゃ

altTitles.en: I Am My Big Sister's Plaything

description.en:
A special collaboration between Yoshida Morohe and Yuzuki Ryouta… a gyaru older step-sister and a younger step-brother with communication apprehension!!

Aonuma Aira is a 13-year-old with no romantic or friendly relationships. But one day, due to his parent's remarriage, the high-schooler Misa becomes his step-sister! She's a completely unknown entity to him, and gets way too close way too fast.

Moreover, her hobby is… makeovers? So she starts making him over until he's turned into a pretty girl!

What's in store for him after he's become his step-sister's plaything?

altTitles.ja: エクソシストのキヨシ君

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak! It all comes together in this new dramatic exorcist battle comedy series!

title.en: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない

altTitles.fr: Fate/Grand Order : Ritsuka Fujimaru n’a rien pigé

description.en: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!
